text: Ugo Pignotti was a fencer from Italy. Pignotti won a gold medal at the 1928 Summer Olympics and two silver medals at the 1932 Summer Olympics. He was born on 19 November 1898 and died on 7 January 1989.Ugo Pignotti == References == Category:1898 births Category:1989 deaths Category:Italian fencers Category:Olympic gold medalists for Italy Category:Olympic silver medalists for Italy Category:Sportspeople from Florence
title: Ugo Pignotti
